author: Slidebean
description:
AI powered hair analysis reveals the next frontier of regulated health tech.

A new wave of AI tools can classify hair loss patterns with high precision using only smartphone photos. However, to avoid FDA medical device regulations, these systems frame their output as “guidance,” not diagnosis.

The result is a business model where AI acts as a funnel to clinics and treatment providers paying referral fees.It underscores a key trend in AI health tech:

Innovation isn’t just in algorithms, it’s in navigating the regulatory landscape and controlling patient pathways.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: This AI knows if you’re balding, it just can’t say it out loud.
